overview: A fast paced action drama set on the Aegean Sea! A team of horny Coast Guards stake-out a team of smugglers who are stealing valuable artifacts and hiding them on the sea bed of the Aegean. The Coast Guards go undercover and seduce the female smugglers then all fuck breaks loose! The male smugglers sense something is wrong and make a run for it. A helicopter car chase ensues and the smugglers are captured!
title: Smuggling Sexpedition
